attributes.action: Improve the social mobility of students within education.
attributes.background: No child/adult in education should have to face any barriers, and they should have the freedom to go as far as they want to go. We need to enforce equality within the education system. Social mobility is the movement of individuals between social strata in a society. It is a change in social status.

rejection.details: If you could start a petition with a more specific request for action, then we could look at this again.
